content: This author completely misses the problem with the current culture of which she writes. There is no way that the left can hate enough to create an environment of love. While experiencing some discomfort may be helpful as this young man grows up, the hateful rhetoric from which it stems will not teach him to love others nor will it help him to respect those from which these messages are received. This process of hate-based changed is destined to divide and fail. No amount of accuses will turn it into anything but the divisiveness and anger that fills those who preach it.
